name: Focused on Variety
description: So, many ingredients! Your table has become colorful!

name: Nutritionally Balanced
description: Balanced meal: Carbs, Protein, and Vitamins

name: Body Builder
description: You're swole from all that muscle food!

name: Healthy Flow
description: With all those veggies, your blood must be super smooth!

name: Pasta Maestro
description: The paste wizard is born!

name: Sushi Chef
description: A true artisan who has mastered sushi!

name: Sandwich Earl
description: Even Mr. Sandwich (John Montagu) would be surprised-what a noble palate!

name: Taco Esteta
description: A gourmet of tacos. You wear that sombrero well!

name: Curry Maharaja
description: You've built a kingdom of aromatic species!

name: Selective Eater
description: That dedication to single-mindedly pursuing one flavor-so admirable!

name: Fisherman
description: A true fisherman who knows all the blessings of the sea!

name: Farmer
description: The strength of a farmer who lives with the soil has reaches your table!

name: Livestock Farmer
description: A livestock farmer raising animals with a lots of love!

name: Humpty Dumpty
description: An egg lover that would surprise even the always-smiling Humpty Dumpty!

name: Maes'Toro
description: Maes'Toro, master of tuna, wins thunderous applause again today!

name: Popeye
description: Like power-packed Popeye, your nutrition is fully charged!

name: Cowboy
description: Like a cowboy riding the wilds, an adventurer in pursuit of freedom and flavor!

name: Quick Decision Maker
description: Amazing decision-making speed! You never hesitate, even in a pinch!

name: Laid Back and Steady
description: Controlling life at your own pace-now that's cool!

name: Unique Palate
description: Your sense of taste is one of a kind!

name: Refined Palate
description: Oh, traveler with a refined palate, your tongue is truly first-class!
